verses.verse: Now the Lord<WH3068> spoke<WH1696> to Moses<WH4872> after<WH310> the death<WH4194> of the two<WH8147> sons<WH1121> of Aaron,<WH175> when they had approached<WH7126> the presence<WH6440> of the Lord<WH3068> and died.<WH4191>

And the Lord<WH3068> said<WH559> to Moses,<WH4872> "Tell<WH1696> your brother<WH251> Aaron<WH175> that he shall not enter<WH935> at any<WH3605> time<WH6256> into the holy<WH6944> place inside<WH4480> <WH1004> the veil,<WH6532> before<WH413> <WH6440> the mercy<WH3727> seat<WH3727> which<WH834> is on the ark,<WH727> lest<WH3808> he die;<WH4191> for I will appear<WH7200> in the cloud<WH6051> over<WH5921> the mercy<WH3727> seat.<WH3727>

"Aaron<WH175> shall enter<WH935> the holy<WH6944> place with this:<WH2088> with a bull<WH6499> <WH1121> <WH1241> for a sin<WH9128> offering<WH9128> and a ram<WH352> for a burnt<WH5930> offering.<WH5930>

"He shall put<WH3847> on the holy<WH6944> linen<WH906> tunic,<WH3801> and the linen<WH906> undergarments<WH4370> shall be next<WH5921> to his body,<WH1320> and he shall be girded<WH2296> with the linen<WH906> sash,<WH73> and attired<WH6801> with the linen<WH906> turban<WH4701> (these<WH1992> are holy<WH6944> garments<WH899>). Then he shall bathe<WH7364> his body<WH1320> in water<WH4325> and put<WH3847> them on.

"And he shall take<WH3947> from the congregation<WH5712> of the sons<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> two<WH8147> male<WH8163> goats<WH5795> for a sin<WH9128> offering<WH9128> and one<WH259> ram<WH352> for a burnt<WH5930> offering.<WH5930>

"Then Aaron<WH175> shall offer<WH7126> the bull<WH6499> for the sin<WH9128> offering<WH9128> which<WH834> is for himself, that he may make<WH3722> atonement<WH3722> for himself and for his household.<WH1004>
"And he shall take<WH3947> the two<WH8147> goats<WH8163> and present<WH5975> them before<WH6440> the Lord<WH3068> at the doorway<WH6607> of the tent<WH168> of meeting.<WH4150>
"And Aaron<WH175> shall cast<WH5414> lots<WH1486> for the two<WH8147> goats,<WH8163> one<WH259> lot<WH1486> for the Lord<WH3068> and the other<WH259> lot<WH1486> for the scapegoat.<WH5799>
"Then Aaron<WH175> shall offer<WH7126> the goat<WH5795> on which<WH834> the lot<WH1486> for the Lord<WH3068> fell,<WH5927> and make<WH6213> it a sin<WH9128> offering.<WH9128>

"But the goat<WH5795> on which<WH834> the lot<WH1486> for the scapegoat<WH5799> fell,<WH5927> shall be presented<WH5975> alive<WH2416> before<WH6440> the Lord,<WH3068> to make<WH3722> atonement<WH3722> upon it, to send<WH7971> it into the wilderness<WH4057> as the scapegoat.<WH5799>

"Then Aaron<WH175> shall offer<WH7126> the bull<WH6499> of the sin<WH9128> offering<WH9128> which<WH834> is for himself, and make<WH3722> atonement<WH3722> for himself and for his household,<WH1004> and he shall slaughter<WH7819> the bull<WH6499> of the sin<WH9128> offering<WH9128> which<WH834> is for himself.

"And he shall take<WH3947> a firepan<WH4289> full<WH4393> of coals<WH1513> of fire<WH784> from upon the altar<WH4196> before<WH4480> <WH6440> the Lord,<WH3068> and two handfuls<WH4393> <WH2651> of finely<WH1851> ground<WH1851> sweet<WH5561> incense,<WH7004> and bring<WH935> [it] inside<WH4480> <WH1004> the veil.<WH6532>

"And he shall put<WH5414> the incense<WH7004> on the fire<WH784> before<WH6440> the Lord,<WH3068> that the cloud<WH6051> of incense<WH7004> may cover<WH3680> the mercy<WH3727> seat<WH3727> that is on [the ark of] the testimony,<WH5715> lest<WH3808> he die.<WH4191>

"Moreover, he shall take<WH3947> some<WH4480> of the blood<WH1818> of the bull<WH6499> and sprinkle<WH5137> [it] with his finger<WH676> on the mercy<WH3727> seat<WH3727> on the east<WH9506> [side]; also in front<WH6440> of the mercy<WH3727> seat<WH3727> he shall sprinkle<WH5137> some<WH4480> of the blood<WH1818> with his finger<WH676> seven<WH7651> times.<WH6471>

"Then he shall slaughter<WH7819> the goat<WH5795> of the sin<WH9128> offering<WH9128> which<WH834> is for the people,<WH5971> and bring<WH935> its blood<WH1818> inside<WH413> <WH4480> <WH1004> the veil,<WH6532> and do<WH6213> with its blood<WH1818> as he did<WH6213> with the blood<WH1818> of the bull,<WH6499> and sprinkle<WH5137> it on the mercy<WH3727> seat<WH3727> and in front<WH6440> of the mercy<WH3727> seat.<WH3727>

"And he shall make<WH3722> atonement<WH3722> for the holy<WH6944> place, because<WH4480> of the impurities<WH2932> of the sons<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> and because<WH4480> of their transgressions,<WH6588> in regard to all<WH3605> their sins;<WH9128> and thus<WH3651> he shall do<WH6213> for the tent<WH168> of meeting<WH4150> which abides<WH7931> with them in the midst<WH8432> of their impurities.<WH2932>

"When he goes<WH935> in to make<WH3722> atonement<WH3722> in the holy<WH6944> place, no<WH3808> one<WH120> shall be in the tent<WH168> of meeting<WH4150> until<WH5704> he comes<WH3318> out, that he may make<WH3722> atonement<WH3722> for himself and for his household<WH1004> and for all<WH3605> the assembly<WH6951> of Israel.<WH3478>

"Then he shall go<WH3318> out to the altar<WH4196> that is before<WH6440> the Lord<WH3068> and make<WH3722> atonement<WH3722> for it, and shall take<WH3947> some<WH4480> of the blood<WH1818> of the bull<WH6499> and of the blood<WH1818> of the goat,<WH5795> and put<WH5414> it on the horns<WH7161> of the altar<WH4196> on all<WH5439> sides.<WH5439>

"And with his finger<WH676> he shall sprinkle<WH5137> some<WH4480> of the blood<WH1818> on it seven<WH7651> times,<WH6471> and cleanse<WH2891> it, and from the impurities<WH2932> of the sons<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> consecrate<WH6942> it.
"When he finishes<WH3615> atoning<WH3722> for the holy<WH6944> place, and the tent<WH168> of meeting<WH4150> and the altar,<WH4196> he shall offer<WH7126> the live<WH2416> goat.<WH5795>

"Then Aaron<WH175> shall lay<WH5564> both<WH8147> of his hands<WH3027> on the head<WH7218> of the live<WH2416> goat,<WH5795> and confess<WH3034> over<WH5921> it all<WH3605> the iniquities<WH5771> of the sons<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> and all<WH3605> their transgressions<WH6588> in regard to all<WH3605> their sins;<WH9128> and he shall lay<WH5414> them on the head<WH7218> of the goat<WH5795> and send<WH7971> [it] away<WH7971> into the wilderness<WH4057> by the hand<WH3027> of a man<WH376> who [stands] in readiness.<WH6261>
"And the goat<WH5795> shall bear<WH5375> on itself all<WH3605> their iniquities<WH5771> to a solitary<WH1509> land;<WH776> and he shall release<WH7971> the goat<WH8163> in the wilderness.<WH4057>

"Then Aaron<WH175> shall come<WH935> into the tent<WH168> of meeting,<WH4150> and take<WH6584> off<WH6584> the linen<WH906> garments<WH899> which<WH834> he put<WH3847> on when he went<WH935> into the holy<WH6944> place, and shall leave<WH5117> them there.<WH8033>

"And he shall bathe<WH7364> his body<WH1320> with water<WH4325> in a holy<WH6918> place<WH4725> and put<WH3847> on his clothes,<WH899> and come<WH3318> forth<WH3318> and offer<WH6213> his burnt<WH5930> offering<WH5930> and the burnt<WH5930> offering<WH5930> of the people,<WH5971> and make<WH3722> atonement<WH3722> for himself and for the people.<WH5971>
"Then he shall offer<WH6999> up in smoke<WH6999> the fat<WH2459> of the sin<WH9128> offering<WH9128> on the altar.<WH4196>

"And the one who released<WH7971> the goat<WH8163> as the scapegoat<WH5799> shall wash<WH3526> his clothes<WH899> and bathe<WH7364> his body<WH1320> with water;<WH4325> then afterward<WH310> <WH3651> he shall come<WH935> into the camp.<WH4264>

"But the bull<WH6499> of the sin<WH9128> offering<WH9128> and the goat<WH8163> of the sin<WH9128> offering,<WH9128> whose<WH834> blood<WH1818> was brought<WH935> in to make<WH3722> atonement<WH3722> in the holy<WH6944> place, shall be taken<WH3318> outside<WH413> <WH4480> <WH2351> the camp,<WH4264> and they shall burn<WH8313> their hides,<WH5785> their flesh,<WH1320> and their refuse<WH6569> in the fire.<WH784>

"Then the one who burns<WH8313> them shall wash<WH3526> his clothes<WH899> and bathe<WH7364> his body<WH1320> with water,<WH4325> then afterward<WH310> <WH3651> he shall come<WH935> into the camp.<WH4264>

"And [this] shall be a permanent<WH5769> statute<WH2708> for you: in the seventh<WH7637> month,<WH2320> on the tenth<WH6218> day of the month,<WH2320> you shall humble<WH6031> your souls,<WH5315> and not do<WH6213> any<WH3605> work,<WH4399> whether the native,<WH249> or the alien<WH1616> who sojourns<WH1481> among<WH8432> you;

for it is on this<WH2088> day<WH3117> that atonement<WH3722> shall be made<WH3722> for you to cleanse<WH2891> you; you shall be clean<WH2891> from all<WH3605> your sins<WH9128> before<WH6440> the Lord.<WH3068>
"It is to be a sabbath<WH7676> of solemn<WH7677> rest<WH7677> for you, that you may humble<WH6031> your souls;<WH5315> it is a permanent<WH5769> statute.<WH2708>

"So the priest<WH3548> who<WH834> is anointed<WH4886> and ordained<WH4390> <WH3027> to serve<WH3547> as priest<WH3547> in his father's place<WH8478> shall make<WH3722> atonement:<WH3722> he shall thus put<WH3847> on the linen<WH906> garments,<WH899> the holy<WH6944> garments,<WH899>

and make<WH3722> atonement<WH3722> for the holy<WH6944> sanctuary;<WH4720> and he shall make<WH3722> atonement<WH3722> for the tent<WH168> of meeting<WH4150> and for the altar.<WH4196> He shall also make<WH3722> atonement<WH3722> for the priests<WH3548> and for all<WH3605> the people<WH5971> of the assembly.<WH6951>

"Now you shall have<WH1961> this<WH2088> as a permanent<WH5769> statute,<WH2708> to make<WH3722> atonement<WH3722> for the sons<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> for all<WH3605> their sins<WH9128> once<WH259> every year.<WH8141>" And just<WH9201> as the Lord<WH3068> had commanded<WH6680> Moses,<WH4872> [so] he did.<WH6213>
